languages.text: {n}Джай прикасается к золотой аквиле, висящей на цепочке. Голос женщины звенит от раздражения.{/n} "Да поразит меня Великий, если солгу, только вера и Экклезиархия — творения разных миров. Одна чиста и дарует спасение, вторая — гниет на теле первой, чтобы адепты ее наживались на трудах тех, кто ищет сил в уповании".

{n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай прикасается к золотой аквиле, висящей на цепочке. Голос женщины звенит от раздражения.{/n} "Да поразит меня Великий, если солгу, только вера и Экклезиархия — творения разных миров. Одна чиста и дарует спасение, вторая — гниет на теле первой, чтобы адепты ее наживались на трудах тех, кто ищет сил в уповании".

Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts could profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

{n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

languages.text: {n}婕伊触摸着她的链子上金色的双头鹰，声音中充满了苦恼。{/n}“如果我说错了，愿至高无上的神皇鞭打我，但我认为信仰与国教完全是两种截然不同的东西。前者是纯洁的，会给于人们救赎，而后者却是在前者之上衍生而来的，目的是让它的信徒榨取那些渴求希望的人们，从他们的辛苦劳作中获得利益。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊触摸着她的链子上金色的双头鹰，声音中充满了苦恼。{/n}“如果我说错了，愿至高无上的神皇鞭打我，但我认为信仰与国教完全是两种截然不同的东西。前者是纯洁的，会给于人们救赎，而后者却是在前者之上衍生而来的，目的是让它的信徒榨取那些渴求希望的人们，从他们的辛苦劳作中获得利益。”

languages.text: {n}Jae toca el Aquila que lleva en una cadena. La irritación se ha apoderado de su voz. {/n} «Que el Exaltado me fulmine si miento, pero la fe y la Eclesiarquía pertenecen a mundos distintos. Lo primero es puro y otorga la salvación, lo último se encona en el cuerpo de lo primero para que sus adeptos puedan beneficiarse del trabajo de los que no quieren perder la esperanza».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae toca el Aquila que lleva en una cadena. La irritación se ha apoderado de su voz. {/n} «Que el Exaltado me fulmine si miento, pero la fe y la Eclesiarquía pertenecen a mundos distintos. Lo primero es puro y otorga la salvación, lo último se encona en el cuerpo de lo primero para que sus adeptos puedan beneficiarse del trabajo de los que no quieren perder la esperanza».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは自分の鎖に付けられた黄金のアクィラにそっと触れた。その声からは苛立ちが感じられる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンよ、これからあたしが嘘をついたとしてもお許しください…信仰と帝国聖教会はまったく異なる領域。前者は純粋で救いを与えるけれど、後者は前者の身体を腐敗させ、彼らの信奉者が希望に力を求める人々の労苦から利益を得るためにあるのではないかしら」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは自分の鎖に付けられた黄金のアクィラにそっと触れた。その声からは苛立ちが感じられる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンよ、これからあたしが嘘をついたとしてもお許しください…信仰と帝国聖教会はまったく異なる領域。前者は純粋で救いを与えるけれど、後者は前者の身体を腐敗させ、彼らの信奉者が希望に力を求める人々の労苦から利益を得るためにあるのではないかしら」

languages.text: {n}Jae berührt ihren goldenen Adler, der an einer Kette hängt. Ihre Stimme bebt verärgert.{/n} "Der Erhabene soll mich niederstrecken, wenn ich lüge, aber Glaube und Ekklesiarchie sind zwei verschiedene Welten. Ersterer ist rein und gewährt Vergebung, während Letztere sich am Körper des Ersteren labt, damit ihre Adepten von der Arbeit jener profitieren können, die durch Hoffnung nach Stärke streben."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae berührt ihren goldenen Adler, der an einer Kette hängt. Ihre Stimme bebt verärgert.{/n} "Der Erhabene soll mich niederstrecken, wenn ich lüge, aber Glaube und Ekklesiarchie sind zwei verschiedene Welten. Ersterer ist rein und gewährt Vergebung, während Letztere sich am Körper des Ersteren labt, damit ihre Adepten von der Arbeit jener profitieren können, die durch Hoffnung nach Stärke streben."

languages.text: {n}Jae touche l'Aquila doré qu'elle porte à une chaîne. À sa voix, elle semble vexée.{/n} « Que l'Exalté me foudroie si je mens, mais la foi et l'Ecclésiarchie sont deux univers différents. La première est pure et accorde le salut. La deuxième gangrène le cadavre de la première pour que ses adeptes profitent du labeur de ceux qui cherchent la force dans l'espoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae touche l'Aquila doré qu'elle porte à une chaîne. À sa voix, elle semble vexée.{/n} « Que l'Exalté me foudroie si je mens, mais la foi et l'Ecclésiarchie sont deux univers différents. La première est pure et accorde le salut. La deuxième gangrène le cadavre de la première pour que ses adeptes profitent du labeur de ceux qui cherchent la force dans l'espoir. »

languages.text: {n}Jae, bir zincire takılı altın Çift Başlı Kartal'ına dokunuyor. Sesi son derece kızgın.{/n} "Eğer yalan söylüyorsam Görkemli beni bertaraf etsin ama inanç ve Ekleşiarşi tamamen farklı dünyalar. İnanç saftır, kurtuluş vadeder; Ekleşiarşi ise inancın bedenine iltihap gibi yapışır, üstatları da umutta güç arayanların çabalarından kâr eder."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae touches her golden Aquila on a chain. Her voice is brimming with vexation.{/n} "May the Exalted One smite me if I'm lying, but faith and the Ecclesiarchy are of different worlds. The former is pure and grants salvation, the latter festers on the body of the former so that its adepts can profit off the labour of those who seek strength in hoping."
